titles.title: Drug and Device Recall Reporting Act of 1998
To amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require notification of recalls of drugs and devices, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

bill.summary: 3/12/1998--Introduced. Drug and Device Recall Reporting Act of 1998 - Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require a pharmacy that receives notice from a recalling firm of a Class I or Class II recall of a drug or device to notify retail customers that received the drug or device: (1) in writing, for customers receiving the drug or device on prescription; and (2) by public display, for all others. Mandates a civil monetary penalty for violations.
